paper.title: Using Transformations and Verification in Circuit Design

paper.abstract: We show how machine-checked verification can support an approach to circuit design based on two kinds of refinement. This approach starts with a conceptually simple (but inefficient) initial design and uses a combination of ad hoc refinement and algorithmic transformation to produce a design that is more efficient (but more complex).
